meanings.definition: A former monetary unit of Germany.
meanings.sent1: In the past, people in Germany used pfennigs to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I found a jar full of pfennigs in my grandfather's attic.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was so full of pfennigs that it almost burst!
meanings.sent4: Her collection of pfennigs was like a treasure trove from the past.
meanings.sent5: The sound of pfennigs clinking together was music to his ears.

meanings.sent1: She counted the pfennigs one by one to make sure she had enough.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper handed me a handful of pfennigs as change.
meanings.sent3: The children played with the shiny pfennigs, pretending they were pirate coins.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the jingle of pfennigs as people dropped them into the donation box.
meanings.sent5: The old man's pockets were always full of pfennigs, making them bulge.
